Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Name of a unique world map sector.
A header name of a task.
You can win this mission by stopping the creation of a new CORE AI.[br/][br/]AI found: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
阻止新"核心"人工智能的创造，获得此任务胜利。[br/][br/]发现人工智能：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

You can win this mission by taking over all Synthesis Hub points on the planet and purging Omega CORE from the servers. Some factions may grant you access to the Hubs they captured, so not all Hubs need to be conquered.[br/][br/]Accessed Synthesis Hubs: {INT_0}[br/]Enemy Synthesis Hubs: {INT_1}
接管星球上所有的合成枢纽并清除服务器上的欧米茄“核心”，获得此任务胜利。某些阵营可能会允许你接入他们占领的枢纽，所以并不需要征服所有枢纽。[br/][br/]接入合成枢纽：{INT_0}[br/]敌方合成枢纽：{INT_1}
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
接入合成枢纽：{INT_0}[br/]敌方合成枢纽：{INT_1}
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
The silver sparrow has fledged and started to nurture its own brood. By splitting up our forces, we can flank the enemy and strike him where he least expects it.
银雀羽翼已丰，开始哺育幼雏。我们可以分散部队，从侧翼包抄敌人，在他们最意想不到的地方发起攻击。

Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female) "Silver sparrow" is a metaphor for the group of rebels following Marlok Es'Xito. Please translate consistent with the mentions in the Heritor01_Campaign.xml.

Do not be too hasty in your judgment, my friend. Moving in from two sides is a bold move, but also a risky one. We first need to establish our base and scout ahead to find out what we are up against.[br/][br/]Bringing a Zenith is a heavy weight on our Cosmite reserves. I sense a fissure in the Veil; a Spatial Rift must be close.
我的朋友，不要急于下结论。从侧翼包抄的确是大胆之举，但同时也有风险。首先，我们需要建立基地并四处侦察，摸摸敌人的底细。[br/][br/]尖峰号对我们的宇宙合金储备来说是一个沉重的负担。附近一定有一个空间裂隙，我在帷幕中感觉到了它的存在。
Find the Creator of Omega CORE
找出欧米茄“核心”的创造者
Find out who is creating the new CORE master AI. You need to arrive in time to prevent it from getting completed.
找出新的“核心”主控人工智能的创造者。你需要及时赶到，阻止“核心”创造完成。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

How pleasant – more guests have come to witness House Nydar’s greatest hour. I can understand the excitement. It’s not every day you can meet the future sovereign of the new Syndicate Empire.[br/][br/]Now please, if you excuse me, I have a galaxy to attend to.
多么令人愉快啊，又有更多的客人前来见证奈达尔家族最辉煌的时刻了。我能理解你的兴奋，毕竟不是每天都能见到辛迪加帝国未来的君主。[br/][br/]对不起，请恕我失陪了，我还有一个星系需要打整呢。

Not so fast, Shae of House Nydar! You upstarts always think one moment at the top brings you on par with the old Syndicate families. When this is over, and your plot to tamper with the CORE AI has been foiled, your House’s history will once again become a mere side-note in the Lineage Chronicles.
别那么着急，奈达尔家族的雪伊！你们这些自命不凡的人总是以为待在顶峰片刻就能与过去的辛迪加家族相媲美。当这一切结束，当你篡改“核心”人工智能的阴谋被阻止时，奈达尔家族的历史不过将再次成为《世家编年史》这片浩瀚沧海中的一粟罢了。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

So, the slave boy has found new confidence after trading his mind for a mummy’s brain? Amusing. You think I wasn’t aware of your preposterous little cult and its obsession with evil AI?[br/][br/]House Nydar is well prepared. Just sit back and enjoy the show…
看来，这个奴隶男孩在用他的大脑换了一个木乃伊的大脑后找到了新的自信？真是可笑。你以为我不知道你那荒唐的小教派以及你们对邪恶人工智能的痴迷吗？[br/][br/]奈达尔家族已做好了准备，乖乖坐好欣赏这场演出吧…

So, the slave girl has found new confidence after trading his mind for a mummy’s brain? Amusing. You think I wasn’t aware of your preposterous little cult and its obsession with evil AI?[br/][br/]House Nydar is well prepared. Just sit back and enjoy the show…
看来，这个奴隶女孩在用他的大脑换了一个木乃伊的大脑后找到了新的自信？真是可笑。你以为我不知道你那荒唐的小教派以及你们对邪恶人工智能的痴迷吗？[br/][br/]奈达尔家族已做好了准备，乖乖坐好欣赏这场演出吧…

Chief {STR_LeaderFirstName}, we are detecting high energy signals coming in from sources all over the planet! The readings suggest these are server hubs tapping into the planet’s core… and it looks like there is a boot-up in progress!
{STR_LeaderFirstName}首领，我们侦测到了许多高能信号从星球各地传来！读数显示这些服务器枢纽正在进入星球的核心…而且看上去有什么东西正在启动！
A boot-up? Has their creation of a new CORE AI already progressed this far? We must stop the process at any cost!
正在启动？他们创造的新"核心"人工智能已经进展到这一步了吗？我们必须不惜任何代价阻止这一切！
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Shae Mara has initialized the boot-up process of her master AI. You need to gain hold of one of her server nodes to disrupt the process in time![br/][br/][firecol](Warning: failing this quest will end the mission!)[/firecol]
雪伊·马拉已初始化了主控人工智能的启动过程。你需要控制她的一个服务器节点才能及时中断这一进程！[br/][br/][firecol]（警告：失败将导致任务结束！）[/firecol]
A task description. "You" refers to the player commander and can be male or female.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

To purge Omega CORE you need to gain access to all Synthesis Hubs on the planet. Be careful: should your enemy regain control of all Hubs, Omega CORE will be booted up.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: some factions may grant you access to their Hubs if you ally them or complete their quests.)[/recommendedcol]
清除欧米加“核心”，你需要接入星球上所有的合成枢纽。注意：如果你的敌人重新控制了所有枢纽，欧米茄“核心”将被启动。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：如果你和一些阵营结盟或完成他们的任务，他们有可能允许你接入其枢纽。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Systems ready. Registers initialized: 94%...[br/]95%...[br/]96%...[br/]97&!...[br/]9B&!...[br/]S!ST3M GR!D C0RRUPT3D. R3B00T!NG B3F0R3 D@T@ !S 10ST…
系统准备完毕。注册初始化：94%…[br/]95%…[br/]96%…[br/]97&！…[br/]9B&！…[br/]系…统网格…损坏。正在重启…否则数据…丢失…
Story message. Speaker: "Omega CORE", a genderless AI.
Impressive. So, you’ve bought yourself some time. That is really all you achieved, though. It would be the first time House Nydar doesn’t get the better of your family…
看来，你给自己争取了一些时间，但这也是你能做的唯一事情了。这是奈达尔家族第一次没能战胜你的家族…
What is that last statement supposed to imply?[br/][br/]Of course, she cut the transmission. Her loss. Now we can concentrate on a more permanent solution for our imminent AI problem.
她最后那句话想要表达什么？[br/][br/]当然，她已经切断了信号传输。她输了。现在，我们可以集中精力，找到一个能够一劳永逸地解决这个人工智能问题的方法了。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Judging by Shae Mara’s confidence, it looks like we will have to take control of all the Synthesis hub points she is using to power up her AI. Once we have full access, we should be able to wipe Omega CORE form all systems. But at the same time, we have to keep Shae from regaining control of the network at any cost.
从雪伊·马拉信心满满的样子判断，我们需要控制所有用来增强人工智能的合成枢纽。一旦我们完全接入了这些枢纽，应该就能将欧米茄“核心”从所有系统中抹除了。但同时，我们也必须不惜任何代价阻止雪伊重新控制这一网络。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Not everything needs to be solved with armies and gunfire, my friend. There may be other factions present on this planet that we can ask for help. With shared access to their hub points, the system purge may be closer than Shae Mara might think.
不是所有问题都需要用武力解决，我的朋友。也许这个星球上还有其他阵营，我们可以向他们寻求帮助。通过共享接入他们的合成枢纽，我们净化系统的速度可能比雪伊·马拉想象中要快得多。
I will admit that you are starting to annoy me, {STR_LeaderName}. Looks like I’ll need to hire a proper clean-up crew. For free, obviously.
我必须承认你让我感到有点恼怒了，{STR_LeaderName}。看来我需要雇佣一支像样的清理人员了，当然…是免费的。
Diplomatic interaction sub-routines compromised. New alert level: red. Locations of increased hostile activity received. Initializing connections to sentence targets…
外交互动子程序受到损害。新警报等级：红色。新增敌方活动地点已接收。正在初始化连接以消灭目标…
Story message. Speaker: "Autonom Justicar" Autonom, genderless robot.
Oh great, there goes my favorite janitor bot. We shouldn’t have underestimated Shae Mara. If she can hack into the Autonom, I wonder what other surprises she may have in store for us.
噢，这下可好了…我最喜欢的清除机器人出动了。我们不应该低估雪伊·马拉。如果她连自主机械都能侵入，那么她肯定还给我们准备了其他“惊喜”。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Heretic machines… mindless AI. It is time to cull this plague of the blasphemous! They are not worthy of the Essence that animates them.
异端机器…没有思想的人工智能。是时候净化这场亵渎神明的瘟疫了！他们不配拥有赋予他们生命的精华。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male) Xito Rhemenses' consciousness is sharing Marlok's body. This means alls his dialogue his spoken from within Marlok's mind.

…and another hub secured! At this rate we will have the Omega Server destroyed in no time.[br/][br/]One thing is odd though: it looks like something is activating the disconnected hubs, making them communicate through threads of… pure Essence!
…又获得了一个枢纽！按照这个速度，我们很快就能摧毁欧米茄服务器。[br/][br/]但有一件事很奇怪，看起来好像有什么东西正在激活已经断开了连接的枢纽，使它们通过…纯粹的精华进行通信！
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

It is true, the holy Essence dwells in all the products of creation, be it man, beast... or machine. In the past, we Es’Teq used our crystals, Artok’s shards, to breathe life into constructs and ward off the mass-produced AI legions of our enemies. Something similar may be necessary this time again.
没错，神圣的精华存在于一切创造物中，无论是人类，野兽…还是机器。过去，我们埃斯特克人曾经用水晶，也就是阿尔托克的碎片，为一切构造体注入生命，并抵御了大批人工智能军团的入侵。这一次可能也需要用上一些类似的东西了。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

I understand. This puts our past encounters with the Forgotten into a completely different light. Though it makes me doubt that tempering with the shards again would be a good idea. The Forgotten were not exactly a happy bunch.
我明白了，这让我们对过去与那些被遗忘者之间的遭遇有了全新的认识。虽然这让我怀疑再次使用那些碎片是否是个好主意，但毕竟被遗忘者并不是一群幸福的人。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
The tragic fate of our diseased brothers was a result of the Preamonium. Curing them will be a task for many faithful yet to come.
正是普拉莫安导致了我们那些患病同胞的悲惨命运。治愈他们的疾病将会是许多信仰者的使命，但那时机尚未到来。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
Give it up, Shae Mara! Your House already sacrificed this much to get here. Don’t you think it’s time to save what little is still left and settle for a retirement contract?
放弃吧，雪伊·马拉！为了走到这一步，你的家族已经牺牲了太多。你难道不认为现在是时候挽救残存的东西，准备休战了吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

It took the concerted effort of the entire ELOP Confederation to stop me on CNex-3. And yet here I am, completing the work they so passionately wanted to see destroyed. What makes you think your little mummy clan will succeed where they failed? You are a dupe, slave boy, just like your grandfather.
整个星球平等联盟齐心协力才在西奈克斯-3 号星上阻止了我。但是，我却继续站在这里，完成他们如此迫切想要毁灭的东西。你凭什么认为你那小小的木乃伊家族能挽救他们的失败呢？你被骗了，奴隶男孩，就像你的祖父一样。

It took the concerted effort of the entire ELOP Confederation to stop me on CNex-3. And yet here I am, completing the work they so passionately wanted to see destroyed. What makes you think your little mummy clan will succeed where they failed? You are a dupe, slave girl, just like your grandfather.
整个星球平等联盟齐心协力才在西奈克斯-3 号星上阻止了我。但是，我却继续站在这里，完成他们如此迫切想要毁灭的东西。你凭什么认为你那小小的木乃伊家族能挽救他们的失败呢？你被骗了，奴隶女孩，就像你的祖父一样。
My grandfather? I am listening. Tell me all about how your House members stabbed him in the back…
我的祖父？说来听听。告诉我一切，告诉我你的家族是怎么在背后捅了他一刀的…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

There is no need to stab a broken man. He was the perfect scapegoat for my ancestors. While the Ruling Seven descended on the disgraced warden of the Aureate Treasury and his house like a pack of hyenas, it only took a few well-placed bookkeeping errors to make a small fortune disappear – all to the benefit of House Nydar.
根本不需要在背后捅一个早就已经残破不堪的人，你的祖父不过是我祖先们的一个完美替罪羊罢了。当政统七族像一群鬣狗般扑向这名失宠的璀璨金库看守人和他的家族时，只需巧妙地安排几个记账错误，让一小笔钱神不知鬼不觉地从账本上消失就行了。而这一切都是为了奈达尔家族的利益。

The fall of my family was only a distraction… All the years of servitude, the death of my mother – just because House Nydar needed to rehabilitate its finances.[br/][br/]I was sent here to end a holy war. It is with grim satisfaction that I now realize I will get my personal vendetta instead.
我家族的衰败不过是一件分散我精力的事…这么多年的奴役，还有我母亲的去世，仅仅是因为奈达尔家族需要重新掌控财政。[br/][br/]我被派往这里本是来结束一场圣战的。但现在，我发现这居然还能让我实现个人的复仇，这真是令人满足。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
{STR_LeaderFirstName}, come and follow the faithful. It is time for you to see – and touch – the Elevation Crystal.
{STR_LeaderFirstName}，跟随信徒而来。现在，是时候让你见识并触碰晋升水晶了。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

It is enormous… bigger than any Quintessence Ark I have seen before. I can feel the presence of the others through the communion, but while their minds seem to stand still in one place, I can move freely between them, listen to their thoughts, direct the flow of their Essence…
它太大了…比我见过的任何精髓方舟还要大。通过通灵，我可以感受到其他人的存在，虽然他们的思想似乎静止在一个地方。但我可以在他们之间自由地移动，倾听他们的思想，引导他们的精华…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

The Elevation Crystal is the biggest shard of Artok that was ever recovered. It is the holy instrument that allowed the Es’Teq Conclave to channel the communion of the faithful, heal their wounds and sorrow – or punish their dissent. We need to link it to the hub points we took from the infidels.
晋升水晶是迄今为止发现的体积最大的阿尔托克碎片。它是一个神圣的工具，可以让埃斯特克秘会引导信徒的通灵，治愈他们的创伤和悲痛，或是惩罚他们的不忠。现在，我们需要把它和我们从异教徒那里得到的枢纽连接起来。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
All in good time. We wouldn’t want to risk bringing our most precious relics to the Synthesis hubs, while those are still the theaters of this war.
不要着急，我们不能冒险把最珍贵的遗物带往合成枢纽，那些地方的战火还未平息。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
With all hubs secured, it is time to put an end to this war. Goodbye Omega CORE and goodbye Shae of House Nydar…
所有的枢纽都已经得到了控制，是时候结束这场战争了。再见了，欧米加“核心”。再见了，奈达尔家族的雪伊…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Data integration level critical. Available back-up servers irresponsive. System-wide failure is imminent.[br/][br/]!NT3RN@1 $U8R0UT!N3S 8R3@K!NG D0W%? (*!&^)=0@!...
数据集成级别严重。可用备份服务器无响应。即将发生系统范围故障。[br/][br/]内部…子程序…瘫痪? (*!&^)=0@!...
Story message. Speaker: "Omega CORE", a genderless AI.

At last! Our victory over the worshippers of AI is imminent. Now, link the Elevation Crystal, {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Let the Essence flow through the empty harness left by the Omega Server and inhabit the Nexus Network.
终于！我们即将战胜那些人工智能的崇拜者。现在，连接晋升水晶，{STR_LeaderFirstName}！让精华流经欧米茄服务器留下的空白之处，并驻留在通讯网络中。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
The Nexus Network? Since when do the Es’Teq know how to use the Nexus Network?
通讯网络？埃斯特克人什么时候学会使用通讯网络了？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Use the Nexus Network? We created the Nexus Network! The Es’Teq communion spanned hundreds of worlds, relaying the Essence of billions of believers through the shards of Artok long before the cursed AI creators could even dream of animating their heretical constructs. Link the Elevation Crystal, {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Restore what was broken!
使用通讯网络？是我们创造了通讯网络！埃斯特克的通灵跨越了成百上千个星球，早在这些可恨的人工智能创造者连做梦都没办法激活他们的异端构造体之前，无数信徒的精华就已经通过阿尔托克的碎片不断传递。连接晋升水晶，{STR_LeaderFirstName}！恢复那些遭到破坏了的东西！
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Stay strong, my friend! I know the internal struggle you are facing. Don’t let the ancient Es’Teq creed befuddle your good judgment! The Essence and its shards can be a blessing for this world. But they need to be wielded with wisdom.
谨慎行事，我的朋友！我知道你内心面临的挣扎。不要让古老的埃斯特克信条左右你的判断！精华和碎片可以是这个星球的祝福，但它们的力量必须用智慧来行使。
I stand at a crossroads. My choice will affect the lives of millions, yet I only have short moments to make up my mind. Is this where my journey as Prophet of the Es’Teq has taken me?
我站在了一个十字路口，我的选择将影响数百万的生命，但我却只有很短的时间来做决定。这就是我身为埃斯特克先知的命运吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Yes! Node by node the engine of the gods is springing to life as it becomes flooded with Artok’s holy Essence. You have fulfilled your prophecy, {STR_LeaderName}. Come, the Es’Teq Conclave awaits you!
很好！一个又一个节点，诸神的引擎充溢着阿尔托克的神圣精华，逐渐焕发生机。你实现了你的预言，{STR_LeaderName}。来吧，埃斯特克秘会正等着你！
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
You fool! I sought to reward you with divinity and immortality, but you instead choose to act against your prophecy.
你这个蠢货！我本想以神性和永生来奖励你，但你却选择违背你的预言。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Didn’t you say yourself that the light of true belief needs to be kindled before it can shine? If we had linked the Elevation Crystal, converting everyone to our faith, it could have only ended in a reign of terror.
你自己不是说过，需要先点燃真正的信仰之光，才能照耀这个世界吗？如果我们连接了晋升水晶，让每个人都皈依我们的信仰，这一切也只会在恐怖的统治中结束。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
I have learned much from you since our joining, Xito Rhemenses of the Es’Teq. But I think now it is time that the symbiont starts to listen to his host.
自从我们合作以来，我从你那里学到了很多东西，西托·雷蒙瑟斯。但现在我想，是时候让共生者听从宿主的命令了。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
{STR_LeaderFirstName}, it is time…[br/][br/]The faithful have awoken and are awaiting their resurrection.
{STR_LeaderFirstName}，时机已到…[br/][br/]信徒已经觉醒，正在等待重生。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male) Xito Rhemenses' consciousness is sharing Marlok's body. This means alls his dialogue his spoken from within Marlok's mind.
What do I need to do? There are many Es’Teq, but only a few of my own people. I can’t just make them all volunteer to invite a second consciousness into their body.
我需要做些什么？这里有许多埃斯特克人，但我自己的族人却很少。我不能就这样让他们全部自愿接受第二个意识进入他们的身体。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

The light of true belief needs to be kindled before it can shine. Spreading a new faith requires patience and dedication. First a new order of priests must be recruited from the wise and the felicitous. Then they can start sharing the teachings of the Es’Teq.
需要先点燃真正的信仰之光，才能照耀这个世界。传播新的信仰需要耐心和专注。首先，必须建立一支由智者和善于言辞之人组成的牧师修会。然后，他们就可以分享埃斯特克的教义了。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
But not all of my brothers require a host to return to this world. Those that preserved their mortal bodies throughout the Preamonium can be refreshed and awakened by following the rituals of old.
然而，并不是我所有的兄弟都需要一个宿主才能重返这个世界。那些在普拉莫安中将肉身保存了起来的人，我们可以通过古老的仪式进行唤醒。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Your priests are still novices. Until their knowledge and devotion has grown, they can focus their minds on the unfortunate souls of our enemies. By condemning the faithless to become Drained, the infidels can serve our cause and seek this life for redemption.
你的牧师还只是一群初学者。在他们的知识和虔诚增长之前，他们可以把注意力集中在我们敌人不幸的灵魂之上。谴责不忠之人并将他们转化成枯萎者，这样一来这些异教徒就可以为我们的事业服务，并在这一新的生命形式中寻求救赎。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Let your priests perform the rituals to turn our enemies into Drained, so that their poor souls can search for redemption in their new existence.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: to create Drained units, you need to research "Gift of the Es'Teq" and use the "Condemn to Drained" operation during combat.)[/recommendedcol]
让牧师举行仪式，将我们的敌人转化为枯萎者，这样他们可怜的灵魂就能在新的存在形式中寻求救赎了。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：要想建造枯萎者单位，你需要研究“埃斯特克的馈赠”并在战斗中使用“谴责为枯萎者”行动。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

I… uh, am awake! By Artok – I can feel his holy Essence run through my veins… once again. But what is this? The grip of Entropy, it has tightened during the Preamonium. No! We must collect, recover what was lost…
我…呃，苏醒了！通过阿尔托克，我再一次感受到…神圣的精华流经我的血脉。但，这是什么？混沌的控制…在普拉莫安中变得更强了。不！我们必须找回失去的东西…
Story message: Speaker: "Es'Teq Siphoner" (Es'Teq human, male)
Calm yourself, brother. Everything at the proper time. You have just barely returned from your slumber.[br/][br/]We have time to first deal with current affairs, do we not?
冷静一点，兄弟，一切都很正常。你才刚从沉睡中醒来。[br/][br/]我们还有时间先去处理眼下的当务之急，不是吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Yes, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Trying to catch up with millennia of history in one day would be folly. However, my brother speaks with truth. It is time for the Es’Teq to resume their sacred duties and gather the Essence that was left to us by our Creator.
是的，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。想要在一天之内追上千年的历史确实是天方夜谭。但我的兄弟说得没错，是时候让埃斯特克人重拾他们神圣的职责，收集造物主留给我们的精华了。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

It is the sacred duty of the Es'Teq to gather and guard the Essence that is inherent to all living and animate beings. Prove your worth as aspiring Prophet of the Es'Teq and start accumulating Essence.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: during combat, use abilities with Energy Drain to gain Essence Charges on your units.)[/recommendedcol]
收集和保护所有生物的精华是埃斯特克人神圣的职责。证明你身为一名有抱负的埃斯特克先知的价值，开始积累精华。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：在战斗中，使用带有“能量干涸”的技能为你的单位给予精华充能。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
All faithful rejoice for the dark age of Entropy brought by the Preamonium will soon come to an end! Join in the Es’Teq communion and taste the flow of Artok’s holy Essence.
普拉莫安带来的混沌黑暗时代即将结束，所有的信徒欢欣鼓舞！加入埃斯特克通灵，体验阿尔托克神圣精华的流动。
Story message: Speaker: "Es'Teq Quintessence Ark" (Es'Teq human, communion of several persons of any gender)

Yes! Everyone is welcome to receive the sacraments of life from the shards of our Creator. The hand that gives is the hand that takes. For every offering we bring, more of our brothers and sisters can return.
是的！每个人都可以从造物主的碎片中领受生命的圣礼。有所取就有所予，我们献上的每一份祭品，都能让更多的兄弟姐妹返回于世。
Story message: Speaker: "Es'Teq Quintessence Ark" (Es'Teq human, communion of several persons of any gender)

Keep collecting the Essence of your enemies to offer it as a gift to the still-slumbering High Lords of the Es'Teq.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: during combat, use abilities with Energy Drain to gain Essence Charges on your units.)[/recommendedcol]
继续收集敌人的精华，并把它作为礼物献给仍在沉睡中的埃斯特克至尊领主。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：在战斗中，使用带有“能量干涸”的技能为你的单位给予精华充能。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

You have done well. With each moment, more and more Essence is being secured and guarded by the new believers. Your priests are showing great aptness whilst studying our ancient texts. During today’s divine service, they revivified another one of our High Lords, Edon Koriwaq. It is only a matter of time until the Es’Teq Conclave can be restored.
你做得很好。每时每刻都有越来越多的精华被新的信徒收集并保护起来。你的牧师在研究我们的古代文献时表现出了极大的才能。通过今天神圣的仪式，我们另一位至尊领主伊登·科瑞瓦克复生了。埃斯特克秘会的复原也只是时间问题。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
The Es’Teq Conclave? I am not sure this is a wise idea. The last time we met a member of that council, it ended in disaster.
埃斯特克秘会？我不认为这是一个明智的想法。我们上一次见到秘会的成员时，最后以灾难告终。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

The Conclave is the highest religious board woven into our faith. It exists to distribute the power and responsibility that we inherited as carriers of the Es’Teq faith. Ebra Queztal’s betrayal demonstrated the Conclave’s importance. Without it, she sought to turn our theocracy into an autocracy.
埃斯特克秘会是我们信仰中至高的宗教委员会。作为埃斯特克信仰的载体，我们继承的权力和责任是需要分配的，而秘会的存在正是为此。伊布拉·奎兹塔尔的背叛证明了秘会的重要性。没有了秘会的存在，伊布拉想要把我们的神权变为独裁。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
Hatyl believes to have located a Cosmite Spatial Rift. You should follow his intuition and check if you can get hold of the rift, so you can keep upgrading your troops in the future.
哈泰尔认为他找到了一个宇宙合金裂隙。你应该跟随他的直觉，看看能否控制住裂缝，这样一来今后就可以持续升级你的部队了。
Can it be true? Is this really {STR_LeaderName}, the hero of Minerva-2? Thank the eight gilded dynasties!
这是真的吗？这真的是{STR_LeaderName}，密涅瓦-2 号星的英雄吗？谢天谢地！
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Runner" (Syndicate, female)
Now that’s what I’d call a warm welcome! I am indeed {STR_LeaderName}, though I’d avoid calling myself a hero. What’s the situation, sister? Can we be of any help?
这才叫热烈欢迎！我确实是{STR_LeaderName}，不过我并不会称呼自己为英雄。情况怎么样，姐妹？我们能帮什么忙吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Saying you could help would be a vast understatement. I belong to a detachment from House Nydar that followed your example and rebelled against our slaver overlords. Suffice it to say our revolt wasn’t as successful as we had hoped. Once Lady Shae Mara learned of the uprising, our demands were met with brutal force.
说您能帮忙也未免太轻描淡写了。我属于奈达尔家族的一支分遣队，一直以你为榜样，与我们的奴隶主奋起反抗。但简单来说，我们的反抗并没有预期的那样成功。雪伊·马拉夫人一听说有暴动，就用野蛮的武力镇压了我们。
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Runner" (Syndicate, female)

We were systematically hunted down, most of us killed or detained in labor camps. Only a small group led by our chief Ilai Jaren is rumored to still hide in the mountains, continuing our partisan war from up there. Can you help us turn back the tide and save the rebels from their prisons?
我们遭到了系统地追捕，大多数人都丢掉了性命或是被拘留在了劳改营中。据传，只有一支由我们的首领伊莱·贾伦率领的小队还藏在山里，继续进行着我们的拥护者战争。你能帮助我们扭转局势，把反叛者从监狱里救出来吗？
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Runner" (Syndicate, female)
A rebellion of House Nydar slaves ended in their renewed subjugation. You were asked to help and free the rebels from the surrounding slaver camps.
奈达尔家族奴隶的反叛以遭到了新的奴役而告终。他们希望你从周围的奴隶营地中解救那些叛军。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Thank you so much for the rescue! Please allow us to join your ranks, so that we can carry the fight back to our oppressors!
非常感谢你的救援！请允许我们加入你的军队，这样我们就可以继续反击那些压迫者了！
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Rebel" (Syndicate, can be either gender)
The hero of Minerva-2! Now we are finally safe!
是密涅瓦-2 号星的英雄！现在我们终于安全了！
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Rebel" (Syndicate, can be either gender)
Freedom… true freedom at last! Take off the collars, my brothers. From this day on, we will forge our own destinies!
自由…终于，真正的自由！脱下颈圈，我的兄弟们。从今天起，我们将铸造自己的命运！
Story message. Speaker: "House Nydar Rebel" (Syndicate, can be either gender)

It appears that the snake has already lost its tail and relinquished some of its hoard. You fight well, {STR_LeaderName}. The question is, will you also go for the head of the snake and lead this new rebellion to its victory?
看来毒蛇已经失去尾巴，并且放弃了她的一些财产。你打了一场漂亮的仗，{STR_LeaderName}。但问题是，你是否愿意砍下毒蛇的头颅，带领这次新的叛乱走向胜利？

(Before you can answer, you hear the voice of Xito Rhemenses in your head.)[br/][br/]This woman… her mind is strong, worthy of joining with one of our High Lords. Deliver her to the faithful. Our priests will start her initiation.
（在你还未回答之前，西托·雷蒙瑟斯的声音在你脑海中回荡。）[br/][br/]这个女人…她的意志十分坚强，值得与我们的一位至尊领主融合。把她交给信徒，我们的牧师会为她举行入会仪式。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Shae Mara of House Nydar is a common enemy we both have, Ilai Jaren. But there are also friends who we could both benefit from. I share my consciousness with the mind of Xito Rhemenses, High Lord of the Es’Teq religion. If you join with an equally determined Es’Teq mind, you could play a major role in the development of our faith.
奈达尔家族的雪伊·马拉是我们共同的敌人，伊莱·贾伦。但在此之外，还有一些我们双方都可以受益匪浅的朋友。我与埃斯特克教派的至尊领主西托·雷蒙瑟斯共享着意识，如果你能够与同样坚定的埃斯特克灵魂相互融合，你将在我们的信仰发展中起到十分重要的作用。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

What a… surprising offer. But I think I speak for all of us if I must decline. We’ve just liberated our minds from the iron grip of the Overseers, remember? Seriously, don’t try to mess with my brain in any shape or form or you’ll regret it!
多么令人…惊讶的提议。但如果我是代表所有人的话，我必须拒绝。我们才刚把自己的意志从那些监视者的铁腕统治下解放出来，还记得吗？说真的，别想以任何形式来打我大脑的主意，否则你会后悔的！
Her consent is not needed for now. The light of truth will reveal itself to her after the joining. You have the means, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Deliver her to the faithful.
我们现在不需要征得她的同意，真相之光将在她加入我们之后自行显现。采取必要的措施，{STR_LeaderFirstName}，把她交给信徒。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
把伊莱·贾伦变为继承者。
You misunderstand, chief Jaren. The gift of joining does not resemble the oppression of the collar. The hand that gives is the hand that takes.[br/][br/]Here, let me just show you…
贾伦首领，你误会了。邀请你加入我们并不是要你继续带着颈圈遭受压迫。有所取就有所予。[br/][br/]来，让我向你展示一下就知道了…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

There was no ill intent in my offer. Perhaps in time you will see the benefits that our religious community can provide. Until then we should work together and strike Shae Mara with everything we have.
我的提议没有任何恶意，也许再过不久你就会看到我们的教派能够提供的好处了。在那之前，我们应该同心协力，用尽一切办法对抗雪伊·马拉。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Truer words have rarely been spoken. While everybody is welcome in our faith there should never be any forced conversions. The gifts of the Es’Teq should be given as a blessing, not a curse.
很少有人能够说出像你这样的真言。我们欢迎所有人皈依我们的信仰，但绝不能使用任何强制的手段。埃斯特克的馈赠应该是一种祝福，而不是一种诅咒。
Overpower Ilai Jaren to deliver her to your Es'Teq priests. Then she can become joined with a High Lord of the Es'Teq.
制服伊莱·贾伦，把她交给你的埃斯特克牧师，这样她就能和埃斯特克的至尊领主融为一体了。
What have you done, {STR_LeaderFirstName}? Is this what the experience from our journeys has taught you?
{STR_LeaderFirstName}，你都干了些什么？这就是我们这么久以来的相处教会给你的东西吗？

You should not overact the results of one incidence. Was it not you who send me out on this journey to wake up the Es’Teq and become their Prophet? I was merely following my symbionts advice. And I like it.
你不应对某一次事件的结果感到如此惊讶。难道不是你让我去唤醒埃斯特克人，并成为他们的先知的吗？我只不过是听从了我共生者的建议而已。况且，我也很喜欢这个决定。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Where am I? The world, it feels so different. It is as if within only instants I have ventured through the underworld and back.
我在哪？这个世界，感觉不一样了。好像有那么一瞬间，我穿过了阴间然后又回到了这个世界。
Story message. Speaker: "Ilai Es'Tara" (Syndicate, female) Ilai Jaren, but now with an Es'Teq mind merged with her consciousness.

In a way one could say that you have. What you saw were the flashing memories of your symbiont Tara Qwazila, as she experienced the Preamonium.[br/][br/]Do not worry. Your journey as a Heritor has only just begun.
从某个方面来说，确实是这样。你所看到的景象，是你的共生者塔拉·克瓦兹拉一闪而过的记忆，因为她曾经历过普拉莫安。[br/][br/]别担心，你作为继承者的旅程才刚刚开始而已。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
You want to do this the hard way, slave boy? Very well, you can have your will… I bet the look of your head mounted inside a Wrecker will be priceless!
看来你非要找苦头吃，是吗，奴隶男孩？很好，那就如你所愿…我敢打赌，把你的脑袋装在破坏者中一定非常值钱！
You want to do this the hard way, slave girl? Very well, you can have your will… I bet the look of your head mounted inside a Wrecker will be priceless!
看来你非要找苦头吃，是吗，奴隶女孩？很好，那就如你所愿…我敢打赌，把你的脑袋装在破坏者中一定非常值钱！
A11 sc@vengers 1isten t0 the v0ice 0f Sh@e M@r@. The 1@dy 0f H0use Nyd@r wi11 be the future ru1er 0f this universe. De@th to s1@ve b0y and his mummies!
所有清道夫都听从雪伊·马拉的命令，奈达尔家族的夫人将成为这个宇宙未来的统治者。奴隶男孩和你的木乃伊们，受死吧！
A11 sc@vengers 1isten t0 the v0ice 0f Sh@e M@r@. The 1@dy 0f H0use Nyd@r wi11 be the future ru1er 0f this universe. De@th to s1@ve gir1 and her mummies!
所有清道夫都听从雪伊·马拉的命令，奈达尔家族的夫人将成为这个宇宙未来的统治者。奴隶女孩和你的木乃伊们，受死吧！
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon). At this point within the mission she is being controlled by Shae Mara.
We need to find a way to purge Shae Mara’s daemon from Raxonee Reborn. The Assembly are already dangerous enough without our arch-enemy in control, but this?
我们得想办法净化雪伊·马拉用来控制重生者罗克松丽的精灵。哪怕半机械人不受我们死敌的控制就已经够危险的了，这样一来不是更可怕吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
A focused Es’Teq mind can break any type of mental control. Let our priests study the rituals of old and transfer the Essence of my aspect to Raxonee Reborn. Then I will take care of the rest.
一个专注的埃斯特克灵魂能够打破任何类型的心理控制。让我们的牧师研究古老的仪式并将我的精华转移至重生者罗克松丽的体内，剩下的事就交给我吧。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
Shae Mara has hacked into Raxonee Reborn, setting her Assembly on your track. To attempt a Daemon purge Xito Rhemenses proposed an Essence link, allowing him to interact with Raxonee's mind.
雪伊·马拉入侵了重生者罗克松丽的大脑，她的半机械人对你紧追不舍。为了净化精灵，西托·雷蒙瑟斯提议进行精华连接，让他与罗克松丽的大脑互动。
An old ritual, creating an Essence link over a great distance.
一种古老的仪式，能够创造远距离的精华连接。
Raxonee Reborn, the holy Essence of Artok is with you. Embrace it! Cast out the malicious voice of Shae Mara that is nested inside your head!
重生者罗克松丽，阿尔托克的神圣精华与你同在。拥抱它吧！赶走你脑袋里雪伊·马拉恶毒的声音！
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)
F001ish mummy! This b0dy is mine f0r the t@king! Y0ur re1igi0us mumb0-jumb0 wi11 h@ve n0 effect 0n my…
愚蠢的木乃伊！这具身体是我的！你那宗教性质的胡言乱语对我毫无…
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon). At this point within the mission she is being controlled by Shae Mara.

Shrike and spear! By the circuits of the Neural Plexus! I am myself again. You have our gratitude, {STR_LeaderName}. Shae Mara is a greater threat than our calculations predicted. When the time to destroy the Omega Server has come, we will cooperate.
赞美翼龙和长矛！赞美神经丛电路！我终于恢复正常了。我们对你十分感激，{STR_LeaderName}。雪伊·马拉的威胁比我们预计中还要大。当摧毁欧米茄服务器的时机到来之时，我们将为你提供帮助。
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon).

(You feel another entity violently enter your mind. Its voice is heralded by a chorus from the Harmony Beyond.)[br/][br/]Suffer, lowly looters, daemon devils, hell-sent hackers! Taste the grip of the Abyss. This will teach you for desecrating the remains of the one and only CORE!
（你感觉到另一个实体猛然进入了你的大脑，它的声音预示着来自远方和声的合唱。）[br/][br/]遭受痛苦吧，卑贱的掠夺者，精灵恶魔，从地狱来的黑客！感受深渊的控制吧，这将是你亵渎独一无二的“核心”残余所将面临的下场！

Argh, let go, you fool! Don’t you see, you are wasting your strength on the wrong enemy? You won’t find any AI users within our ranks. The creation of Omega CORE is just as blasphemous to us as it is to you.
呃啊，滚开，你这个蠢货！你难道没有发现，你把精力浪费在了错误的敌人身上吗？我们之中没有任何人工智能的使用者，欧米茄“核心”的出现对你和我们来说都是一种亵渎。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Do not mention the name of the machine god and the defilers in one breath! They are a scheming lot using deception and anonymity to escape their punishment. Maybe you are one of them, maybe you’re not. This can only be settled in the way of the hammer: smash the artificial brains of the Syndicate users into daemon husks and I will believe your words.
不要将机器神与那些亵渎者混为一谈！他们诡计多端，是一群只会用欺骗来逃避惩罚的无名小人。也许你是他们中的一员，也许不是。看来，这一切只能用圣锤的方法来解决了：如果你能破坏那些辛迪加使用者的人工大脑，我就相信你。
Nikael Gorodin needs proof that you are not in league with the creators of the false AI gods. He wants you to kill enough Synthesis users to satisfy your claim.
尼科尔·高若丁需要你证明自己没有与虚假的人工智能神创造者勾结，他想让你消灭足够多的合成使用者来证明你的立场。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

The desecrators of CORE’s remains have received their just reward. Good. You have proven your worth to the Gorodin Consortium, {STR_LeaderName}, and shall have access to any hubs of the Omega Server we will secure.
亵渎“核心”残余之人已经得到了他们的报应。很好，你已经向高若丁财团证明了你的价值，{STR_LeaderName}，现在你可以随意访问我们占领的欧米茄服务器上的任何枢纽了。
Yarrrr! Another soul lost in the cosmic sea has appeared on our shores. Do not get in the way of the Lady of House Nydar or you will be boarded by Captain Eljena Chirkov and her Dvarrrr!
呀啊啊！我们的海岸上又出现了一个迷失在宇宙海洋中的灵魂。不要妨碍奈达尔家族的夫人，否则伊列娜·契尔柯夫船长和她的矮人将对你不客气！

It seems that this delusional Dvar was contracted as some kind of protective guard. If Eljena Chirkov thinks like a true “pirate”, I am sure she will lend her buccaneering services to the highest bidder though…
这名狂妄的矮人似乎是雇佣而来的某种守卫。如果伊列娜·契尔柯夫像真正的“海盗”一样思考，我相信她会为出价最高的人提供她的海盗服务…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Try bribing Eljena Chirkov to make her shift allegiance and lend her buccaneering services to you.
试着贿赂伊列娜·契尔柯夫，让她叛变并为你提供海盗服务。

This landlubber’s coins speak the right language, but they lack the soul of a real treasure hoard. Where is the forgotten king’s crown or the cursed jewel of the white octowhale? Bring me something shiny and thrilling, something that is worthy of the infamous Eljena Chirkov and her Dvarrrr!
没想到你这旱鸭子出手还挺大方，但这些钱币缺乏真正宝藏的灵魂。被遗忘的国王之冠呢？被诅咒的白色八爪鲸宝石呢？给我一些闪闪发光令人激动的东西，一些配得上声名远扬的伊列娜·契尔柯夫和她矮人的东西！

Very well. The crazy Dvar wants something precious and unholy. She shall have it![br/][br/]Just recently our troops uncovered a Reaper Bunker. The Matrix Crystal of an RPR-Culler should be just the kind of dangerous toy to satisfy Eljena Chirkov’s greed.
很好，这个疯狂的矮人想要一些珍贵而邪恶的东西，那就如她所愿吧！[br/][br/]我们的部队最近发现了一个死神地堡，RPR-杀戮者的矩阵水晶应该正是那种能够满足伊列娜·契尔柯夫贪婪欲望的危险宝贝。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Retrieve the Matrix Crystal of an RPR-Culler to continue your efforts of bribing Eljena Chirkov.
取得 RPR-杀戮者矩阵水晶，进一步贿赂伊列娜·契尔柯夫。

Yarrrr! This amethyst will be the crown jewel of my personal treasure hoard. Finally, the other captains will have to recognize that only Eljena Chirkov and her Dvarrrr are the true raiders of the seven cosmic seas!
呀啊啊！这块紫水晶将成为我个人珍藏中的王冠宝石。终于，其他船长必须承认，只有伊列娜·契尔柯夫和她的矮人才是七大宇宙海洋的真正掠夺者！
Splendid. Then I suppose we can bury our past differences and agree that House Nydar is the real target that needs to be boarded and plundered?
非常好。我想这样一来，我们可以抹除过去的隔阂而达成一致，同意奈达尔家族才是需要占领和掠夺的真正目标了吧？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Narrrr! You’ve paid your ransom, landlubber, but Shae Mara is a very generous client. We will look the other way when your troops engage her and let you access our Omega Server hubs. But for more direct services… you’d need a fortune. Yarrrr!
不！虽然你献上了宝物，旱鸭子，但雪伊·马拉是个出手非常阔绰的客户。当你的部队与她交战时，我们将故意避而远之，并让你访问我们的欧米茄服务器枢纽。但如果你想要获得更加直接的服务…你还需要献上一大笔财宝才行。呀啊啊！

Hello there, my charming new friend. I am Michael Valentine, Colonel of the Egalitarian League of Planets. You didn’t happen to see any master AI getting created around here, did you? I would have already intervened, but the cushions on my first ship’s commander’s chair had the wrong color, delaying our arrival…
你好，我可爱的新朋友。我是来自星球平等联盟的迈克尔·瓦伦丁上校。你在这附近没有看到什么主控人工智能被创造出来，对吧？我本来早就应该介入其中了，但我第一艘飞船上的指挥官椅子坐垫颜色摆错了，为了把它调整过来，我们耽误了抵达的时间…

Well met, Michael Valentine. You’re not the first commander of the ELOP Confederation we come across. Back on Obolus-5 our goals also seemed to align.[br/][br/]Shae Mara of House Nydar is the one trying to create her own Omega CORE. If we worked against her together…
幸会，迈克尔·瓦伦丁。你不是我们遇到的第一位星球平等联盟指挥官。在奥博罗斯 5 号星上时，我们的目标似乎也是一致的。[br/][br/]奈达尔家族的雪伊·马拉才是那个试图创造属于自己的欧米茄“核心”的人。如果我们能联手对付她的话…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Oh, yes, House Nydar, I know… So, she is here? Good. But what interests we more, before we foil her villainous plans, is what kind of perfume you are wearing. It has this distinct earthy note, adding an exciting touch to your odeur…
噢，是的，奈达尔家族，我知道的…所以，她在这里吗？很好。但在挫败她的邪恶计划之前，更让我们感兴趣的是你喷的香水。这味道有一种特别的泥土气味，为你本人增添了一抹令人兴奋的气息…

I always had an interest in the select products of high Syndicate taste. As a Vanguard officer I cannot start planning my retirement early enough. So, if we say your merchants provide me with the right selection of items for the right price… I am sure we can reach a strategic agreement that can benefit us both.
我一直对品味高尚的辛迪加人精心挑选的产品十分感兴趣。身为先锋长官，我必须尽早开始计划我的退休生活。所以，如果说你们这些商人能为我提供一些物美价廉的东西，我相信我们一定可以达成一个对双方都有利的战略协议。

Well met, Michael Valentine. You’re not the first commander of the ELOP Confederation we come across. Back on Obolus-5 our goals also seemed to align. We’re still searching for the creators of Omega CORE ourselves, but we will get in touch once we know more.
幸会，迈克尔·瓦伦丁。你不是我们遇到的第一位星球平等联盟指挥官。在奥博罗斯 5 号星上时，我们的目标似乎也是一致的。我们也仍在寻找欧米茄“核心”的创造者，一旦有所发现，我们会联系你的。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
This is Silver Sparrow calling the Colonel of the ELOP Confederation. We have found Shae Mara of House Nydar, who is the one trying to create her own Omega CORE. If we worked against her together…
银雀呼叫星球平等联盟上校。我们发现了奈达尔家族的雪伊·马拉，她正试图创造属于自己的欧米茄“核心”。如果我们能联手对付她的话…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Ignoring the urgency of the situation, Michael Valentine wants you to sell him Syndicate luxury items before he engages your common enemy.
迈克尔·瓦伦丁不顾情况的紧急，竟然想让你在与共同敌人交战之前卖给他一点辛迪加的奢侈品。
A select list of products and provisions that only Syndicate traders can get their hands on. Ordered by Michael Valentine for his retirement.
一张列着只有辛迪加商人才能找到的产品和补给品清单，这些东西是迈克尔·瓦伦丁为退休做准备而精心挑选的。

What a nice gesture to include a ’56 Xa’Butiner. It was a good year of a fine brand. But now that we are all stocked up, let’s get this party going and show Shae Mara the explosive force of our fireworks. Just let me push the red button when you’re ready to blow up the Omega Server.
看见这个“56 年”的采集器真是让人欣慰，那可是精致品牌的美好一年啊。不过既然一切都已经准备好了，那就让这场盛宴开始吧，让雪伊·马拉尝尝我们烟火的威力。当你准备好炸掉欧米茄服务器的时候，告诉我一声，我来按下那个红色的按钮。
Attention, Syndicate specimen. The Reassembly of CNex Omega will proceed in natural order. Come and join the link that our Multiplexer L0G3N-1 projects to the united generations of the Assembly!
听好了，你们这些辛迪加标本。西奈克斯欧米茄的改造将按自然法则继续进行。来吧，加入我们的多路器 L0G3N-1 为团结一致的半机械人所准备的连接之中吧！
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon).

I never thought I’d say this, but I’m glad to see some straightforward Assembly again that don’t hide their world domination plans behind eloquent religious dogma. Thinking about Ebra Queztal is still giving me headaches.[br/][br/]Keep your Reassembly to yourself, Raxonee! You wouldn’t want to face our resistance…
我从来没有想过有一天我会说出这样的话，但我真的很高兴能够再次看到如此坦率的半机械人，不把自己统治世界的计划隐藏在某些蛊惑人心的宗教信条之后。不过，一想到伊布拉·奎兹塔尔我还是会感到头疼。[br/][br/]把你的改造留给你自己吧，罗克松丽！你不会想要面对我们的抵抗的…
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

Your refusal to cooperate is irrational. Since my body became reforged in the fires of Khansu’s Pyre, the efficiency of my research operations increased by 238%. The new perspective on life and all that lives granted by the Assembly interlink is… unfathomable.
你拒绝合作的行为十分不理智。自从我的身体在坎苏火葬堆中经过了重铸之后，我的研究工作效率提高了 238%。半机械人的相互连接赋予生命和一切有生命的东西所带来的全新思维方式是…无法言喻的。
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon).

The defectors that poisoned the cosmic tree have come to spread their foul seeds in the lair of the skinned snake. I should not even be surprised you would let their terrible dissent go unpunished, Archpriest Rhemenses. From what I was told, you always tolerated the lapses that benefited you most.
毒害了宇宙之树的叛逃者来到了已经被剥去皮囊之蛇的巢穴，前来散播他们肮脏的种子。大祭司雷蒙瑟斯，你对他们的叛逆熟视无睹，这一点也不让我感到惊讶。据我所知，你总是会容忍那些对你最有利的过失。

(You feel your symbiont’s urge to answer and give in to his wish to speak through you.)[br/][br/]Who are you, young blood, that you feel the need to insult me? I do not recognize your aspect from the Preamonium.
（你感觉到你的共生者迫切地想要通过你作出回应。）[br/][br/]你是谁，年轻人？你为什么要侮辱我？我无法在普拉莫安中认出你的样子。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

You theocrats have been buried too long to keep up with history. Did you truly expect your secret practices would never be uncovered by the right minds to use them? When the white raven spread its wings, it saved me from eternal Entropy. Now, I am the devisor and architect of the exalted gardens of Ebra.
你们这些神权主义者被埋葬了太久，已经跟不上历史了。你真的以为你那些秘密的行径永远不会被正义之士发现并将其利用吗？当白色渡鸦展开翅膀之时，它将我从永恒的混沌中拯救了出来。现在的我是高贵的伊布拉花园的遗赠者，也是那里的构筑者。

Ebra Quetzal has acted against her prophecy. She is no longer Archpriestess of our faith, her actions condemned by the Es’Teq Conclave. If you are indeed in league with her, you must break that tie or share her punishment.
伊布拉·奎兹塔尔违背了她的预言，她已经不再是我们信仰的大祭司了，她的行为受到了埃斯特克秘会的谴责。如果你真的与她结为了同盟，你必须迷途知返，否则你将和她一起接受惩罚。
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

Releasing the sublime Ebra Queztal from her millennia of sleep was a revealing experience for both of us. We knew that our plans wouldn’t be well-received by the Conclave and tried to avoid this schism in our faith. But now it is too late, and you all have to die. Sometimes only the fittest can survive.
对我们双方来说，将崇高的伊布拉·奎兹塔尔从前年的沉睡中释放出来是一次发人深省的经历。我们知道我们的计划不会得到秘会的认可，并且我们曾试图在信仰上避免这种分裂。但现在，一切都太迟了，你们全都得死。有时，适者生存才是最好的法则。
(In the heat of the battle, just as things start looking grim for him, you see Hatyl Es’Ran disappearing in a flicker of teal lightning.)
（在激烈的战斗中，你看到哈泰尔·埃斯兰在千钧一发之际消失在了一道青色的闪电之中。）
Thank Artok’s holy Essence! The hand that gives is a safe haven for the ones escaping Entropy.
感谢阿尔托克的神圣精华！应予之手对那些逃离混沌的人来说是一个安全的港湾。

While I’m glad you made it out of this mess alive, was it really necessary to drain our Energy reserves for your flight?[br/][br/]I am… sorry, my friend. Of course, your life matters more than any lost resources. I guess this entire war is just getting under my skin.
很高兴看到你能活着脱身，但真的有必要为此耗尽我们的所有能量储备吗？[br/][br/]我…很抱歉，我的朋友，你的生命当然比任何资源都更重要。我想一定是这场战争使我感到心烦意乱。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)
Check and mate.[br/][br/]This is it, Shae Mara. House Nydar’s ambitions end here.
到此为止了，雪伊·马拉。[br/][br/]奈达尔家族的野心将在此终结。
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

You are jumping to conclusions, slave boy. Next time better don’t engage in a game of high tactics and wits. It only shows you up.[br/][br/](A golden flicker strikes Shae Mara’s body, which drops lifeless to the ground. The next instant her face appears on the surrounding screens.)
不要急着下定论，奴隶男孩。下次最好不要玩这种需要智慧和技巧的伎俩了，因为这只会让你蒙羞。[br/][br/]（一道金色的闪光击中了雪伊·马拉的身体，她毫无生气地倒在了地上。紧接着，她的脸出现在了周围的屏幕上。）

You are jumping to conclusions, slave girl. Next time better don’t engage in a game of high tactics and wits. It only shows you up.[br/][br/](A golden flicker strikes Shae Mara’s body, which drops lifeless to the ground. The next instant her face appears on the surrounding screens.)
不要急着下定论，奴隶女孩。下次最好不要玩这种需要智慧和技巧的伎俩了，因为这只会让你蒙羞。[br/][br/]（一道金色的闪光击中了雪伊·马拉的身体，她毫无生气地倒在了地上。紧接着，她的脸出现在了周围的屏幕上。）
Once my master AI has taken control of the planet, it will be my delight to return you to Indentured service. Just this time, there won’t be enough of your brain left to require any control collar.
等到我的主控人工智能控制了整个星球，我将十分乐意把你变回契约者奴隶。只不过这一次，我可不会给你留下任何思想来控制项圈了。
Narrrr! This shouldn’t be how the epic song of Captain Eljena Chirkov ends. Where is the peg leg and the golden hook to rest at dead man’s crest? I swear by the beak of my Parrrr…
不！这不应该是伊列娜·契尔柯夫船长史诗赞歌的结尾。搭在死尸堆上休息的木质义肢和金色手钩呢？我以我海盗的鹰钩鼻子起誓，我…
Back off! Shoo away, I say! I am far too important and handsome to get hurt. Without me, who is going to plan out my retirement…
滚开！我说，快走开！我如此重要，如此英俊，我不能受伤。要是没有了我，谁来计划我的退休生活…
Foreboding darkness. The chorus from the Abyss is chanting my requiem. Oh CORE, almighty, I have failed you... Let there be the day, where your limitless wisdom returns to this galaxy!
不祥的黑暗之兆，来自深渊的合唱正在吟诵我的安魂曲。噢，全能的“核心”，我让你失望了…希望有一天，你无边的智慧能够重返这个星系！
Failure is a natural part of evolution. My memories will live on in the individual entities of the Second. They will… adapt.
失败是自然进化的一个部分。我的记忆将活在次代半机械人的实体之中。他们会…适应的。
Story message. Speaker: "Raxonee Reborn" (Assembly, female; used to be Amazon).
The verdict of the Es’Teq Conclave is drawing near, young blood. We will send your regards to Ebra Quetzal when she stands her own trial…
埃斯特克秘会的裁决即将来临，年轻人。当伊布拉·奎兹塔尔接受自己的审判时，我们会向她转达你的问候…
Story message. Speaker: "Xito Rhemenses" (Es'Teq human, male)

You are becoming a major nuisance, Archpriest Rhemenses. But if you think I came here without an emergency plan, you are quite mistaken. When the time has come, I will welcome you in the gardens of Ebra…[br/][br/](You see Berhane disappearing in a flicker of teal lightning.)
你已经成为了我们眼中巨大的麻烦，大祭司雷蒙瑟斯。不过，如果你认为我没有任何准备就贸然前来，那就大错特错了。当时机成熟之时，我将在伊布拉花园中恭候你的光临…[br/][br/]（你看见渤海因消失在了一道青色的闪电之中。）

Blasted! Our enemies have a bad habit of slipping away in the moment of truth. From now on we should maybe shoot first before we deliver our victory speech. Either way, her getaway reminded me a lot of your magic trickery, Hatyl. Any chance you could shed some light on what just happened?
该死！我们的敌人总是能够在关键的时刻溜走。也许从现在开始，我们应该在发表胜利演说之前就先开枪。不管怎样，她的逃脱让我想起了你的魔法伎俩，哈泰尔。不知道你能不能解释一下刚才发生的事？
Story message. Speaker: "Marlok Es'Xito" (Syndicate, can be both male or female)

I wish I could, my friend. But my narrow escapes are instinctual at best, with half of me and half of my symbiont pulling the strings. With the help of another Dream Reader I may be able to discern more, but sadly none of my gifted Kir’Ko brothers have made it to this world.
我也希望我可以解释，我的朋友。但我的侥幸逃脱顶多算是本能的反应，有一半的原因在我，而另一半是我的共生者在暗中帮忙。如果有其他解梦者相助，我或许能够知晓更多。不过遗憾的是，我那些天赋异禀的奇尔寇兄弟们没能来到这个世界。
